title: German Pancakes in the Oven
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°. Place butter in 9x13 baking dish and melt in oven. In blender, combine eggs, milk, flour, and salt. Blend until smooth. Pour batter into pan with melted butter. Bake 20-25 minutes until puffed and golden. Serve immediately with powdered sugar, lemon juice, syrup, or fresh fruit.
